channel.title: Web3 on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Web3 on un01s notes

item.title: Isolated but still connected
item.description: The internet introduces the digital dimension of our society. Then this pandemic makes isolation often. Only the internet makes it bearable. Yes, we may be isolated from each other but we are still connected in many ways. For example, art is one way to share our common experience in words, melody, shapes and colors. But I am not sure about either NFT or WEB3.
